Package ClientSide.GUI

Class UserHome

java.lang.Object
ClientSide.GUI.UserHome
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class UserHome
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
The user home page contains a table showing the assets currently held by the user's unit, their quantities and current average buy order price. The page also showes the unit's current credits. At the bottom of the page, the user can switch to the order history or current orders pages, as well as refresh the table and credits.
Author:
Scott Peachey

    • assetTableListener

      public void assetTableListener()
      Mouse listener that detects when the user clicks on an asset in the table. When this occurs, the asset page is created for the asset.
